label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_014
content:

### Deployments & Changes
- Ran quarterly token inventory: identified 22 long-lived API keys; scheduled rotation and owner confirmation.
- Refreshed IdP metadata for external partner SAML; tested assertions and logout behavior; no regressions.
- Cleaned up stale role grants: removed 9 users still in 'Legacy-Reporting' after migration complete.
- Opened audit exception for one late attestation on 'Finance-Approver' role; set due date and escalation path.

### Events
- Opened audit exception for one late attestation on 'Finance-Approver' role; set due date and escalation path.
- Ran quarterly token inventory: identified 22 long-lived API keys; scheduled rotation and owner confirmation.
